name: blog@devstuff
body:
### Welcome to my new public blog.

I develop scalable, high performance solutions using Scala and SBT, automate with shell scripts, and occasionally dabble in Ruby and Rails. MacOS and Linux are my primary platforms, after a couple of decades (!) on Windows.

I commit as @devstuff. Most of my day-to-day contributions are private to @zendesk, where I collaborate with a bunch of great people.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
